screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 120 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 140) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (48, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 2), size = (68, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (75, 2), size = (98, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 2), size = (300, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (488, 2), size = (450, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1044, 5), size = (30, 38), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (48, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 2), size = (60, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (68, 2), size = (98, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (173, 2), size = (294, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (474, 2), size = (450, 42), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1044, 5), size = (30, 38), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 45 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (195, 26), size = (870, 90), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (30, 15), size = (90, 60), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD", 24)], "itemHeight": 90 }
